
## Mean Effective Invert Elevation

```{r mean-effective-invert-elevation, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
meie1 = read_meie(file1, type1)
meie2 = read_meie(file2, type2)
meie.diff = diff_meie(meie1, meie2)
meie.rmse.station = rmse_meie(meie.diff, "Station")
meie.rmse.time = rmse_meie(meie.diff, "Time")

meie.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_meie) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Mean Effective Invert Elevation Differences at Stations")
meie.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_meie) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Mean Effective Invert Elevation RMSE at Stations")
meie.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_meie) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Mean Effective Invert Elevation RMSE Through Time")
```
